TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UIPropertyMetadata extends System.Windows.PropertyMetadata

summary.span: 为在核心级别具有呈现/用户界面影响的非框架属性提供属性元数据。

span.span: Provides property metadata for non-framework properties that do have rendering/user interface impact at the core level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks （派生自此类） 是更常用的元数据类还用于框架级属性具有呈现/用户界面影响。 (derived from this class) is the more common metadata class used for framework-level properties that also have rendering/user interface impact.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object defaultValue) cil managed

param.name: defaultValue
param.span: 依赖项对象的默认值，通常作为某种特定类型的值提供。

span.span: The default value of the dependency property, usually provided as a value of some specific type.

summary.span: 用属性的指定默认值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the specified default value for the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback propertyChangedCallback) cil managed

param.name: propertyChangedCallback
param.span: 对处理程序实现的引用，每当属性的有效值更改时，属性系统都将调用该处理程序实现。

span.span: Reference to a handler implementation that is to be called by the property system whenever the effective value of the property changes.

public: UIPropertyMetadata(System::Object ^ defaultValue, System::Windows::PropertyChangedCallback ^ propertyChangedCallback, System::Windows::CoerceValueCallback ^ coerceValueCallback, bool isAnimationProhibited);

param.name: defaultValue
param.span: 依赖项对象的默认值，通常作为某种特定类型的值提供。

span.span: The default value of the dependency property, usually provided as a value of some specific type.

param.name: isAnimationProhibited
param.span: 设置为 以防止属性系统对该元数据应用到的属性进行动画处理。

span.span: Set to to prevent the property system from animating the property that this metadata is applied to.

param.span: 如果尝试对此类属性进行动画处理，它们将引发运行时异常。

span.span: Such properties will raise run time exceptions if animations of them are attempted.
The default is .

summary.span: 用指定的默认值和回调以及用于在属性上禁用动画的布尔值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the specified default value and callbacks, and a Boolean used to disable animations on the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsAnimationProhibited { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，声明是否应在应用了包含元数据实例的依赖项对象上禁用动画。

span.span: Gets or sets a value declaring whether animations should be disabled on the dependency property where the containing metadata instance is applied.

value.span: 指示不允许动画； 指示允许动画。

span.span: indicates that animations are disallowed; indicates that animations are allowed.
The default is (animations allowed).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，在中可用的默认依赖项属性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]framework 实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]可以进行动画处理。In general, the default dependency properties available in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework implementation [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] can be animated. 可能将此属性设置为`true`要禁用动画在其自己自定义的依赖项属性的元数据中。You might set this property to `true` in the metadata of your own custom dependency property to disable animations on it. 如果具有此值的属性`true`将引发尝试使用作为动画目标，运行时异常。If a property with this value `true` attempts to be used as an animation target, a runtime exception will be raised. 属性对任何派生类的通常定义为读写模式的对象模型中。Properties on any derived classes of are normally defined in the object model as read-write. 这是以便可以在实例初始化后对它们进行调整。This is so they can be adjusted after initialization of the instance. 但是，作为对的调用的一部分使用元数据后， ，或、 属性系统将密封该元数据实例和传达元数据的详细信息的任何属性都被视为不可变。However, once the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and any properties that convey the specifics of the metadata are now considered immutable. 正在尝试设置后是`true`对此元数据实例将引发的异常。Attempting to set once is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception.
